Sentencas: Enhancing efficiency, meeting environmental standards, and preserving fuel resources are highly important objectives in power generation systems, at a time where world is endangered by several energetic, environmental, and health crises.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: Thus, better designs are constantly sought to increase the performance of such systems.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: In this study, an environment friendly trigeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is selected and designed for domestic applications.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: Negligible emissions are thus recorded as the SOFC is fueled solely by hydrogen.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: The system is modeled following three steps: the energy simulation of residential building to determine its demands, the system's prime mover-SOFC, and the trigeneration recovery system ensuring the maximum coverage of heating, cooling, and domestic hot water loads respectively.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: The system is then evaluated under the 4-E assessment criteria: energy, exergy, economy, and environment.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: Depending on these criteria, the system is multi-objectively optimized.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: Two operation strategies are adopted: off-grid following electrical load and on-grid base load operations.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: Optimization results show that the trigeneration system is energetically and economically superior and performs well under both strategies.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications

Sentencas: The maximum energy and exergy efficiencies (65.2% and 45.77%) and minimum system cost rate (22.2 cents/kWh) are obtained under on-grid base load operation.
Titulo: 4-E based optimal management of a SOFC-CCHP system model for residential applications
